WRITING.TEXT: the masses are the ones who are running this country into the ground. It is mainly because their education is so insufficient that it is so bad. The sad thing is that it is not that they are unable to get an education, it's that education has been demonized by people with education because they know if the masses are ignorant it will be easier for them to hold on to their power.
sorry, I thought it was 7 per day, but after reading your guide I guess I was wrong. thanks for the leniency.
